00039 UPath
00040 UPath::operator + ( const UPath& path ) const
00041 {
00043         if ( path._path.length() == 0 )
00044                 return _path;
00045 
00047         return _path + "/" + path._path;
00048 }
00049 
00050 //----------------------------------------------------------
00051 UPath&
00052 UPath::operator += ( const UPath& path )
00053 {
00055         if ( path._path.length() == 0 )
00056                 return *this;
00057 
00059         _path += "/";
00060         _path += path._path;
00061         return *this;
00062 }

00064 //----------------------------------------------------------
00065 bool
00066 UPath::GetDriveRoot( tstring& root ) const
00067 {
00069         tstring::size_type loc = _path.find_first_of( ':' );
00070         if ( loc == -1 )
00071                 return false;
00072 
00074         root = _path.substr( 0, loc + 1 );
00075         root = "\\";
00076 
00078         return true;
00079 }

00082 //==========================================================

00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 void
00088 UPath::CreatePath( const tstring& str )
00089 {
00090         bool first = true; 
00091         tstring::const_iterator start = str.begin();
00092 
00093         //loop through the '\' or '/' separated components of the path
00094         while ( start != str.end() ) 
00095         {
00096                 const char *separators = "/\\";
00097                 tstring::const_iterator end = std::find_first_of( start, str.end(), separators, separators + strlen( separators ) );
00098                 tstring temp( start, end );
00099 
00101                 if ( temp == ".." )
00102                 {
00103                         if ( end == str.end() )
00104                                 break;
00105                         else
00106                                 start = ++end;
00107                         continue;
00108                 }
00109 
00111                 if ( ( temp != "" ) && ( temp != "." ) )
00112                 {
00114                         if ( !first )
00115                                 _path += '/';
00116                         first = false;
00118                         for ( tstring::iterator it = temp.begin(); it != temp.end(); ++it )
00119                         {
00120                                 *it = tolower( *it );
00121                         } 
00122                         _path += temp;
00123                 }
00124                 if ( end == str.end() ) 
00125                         break;
00126                 else
00127                         start = ++end;
00128         }
00129 }
